name: Stinky Basketball Monke
description:
Play basketball with stinky monke by throwing him around using ur mouse on the desktop!

-Has funny humor

-Has a backwall trickshot 3 pointer

-Has saving score counter

-Originally made for WallpaperEngine: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2254557464

-Currently supports 16:9 and wider.

-Comment ur ideas m8.

Vid of narration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FveF-we6lcE
